Method Detail

isCaching

public boolean isCaching()
Returns whether this CompositeLocator caches the locations and bends that belong to aggregated locators. So, these do not have to be transformed (by the locator AffineTransform) each time when they are queried, but the memory cost is higher.

setCaching

public void setCaching(boolean caching)
Sets the caching property of this CompositeLocator. @see #isCaching()
